name: USBDeviceFramework
tagline: A better Objective-C/IOKit based USB framework.
body:
# USBDeviceFramework Say hello to USBDeviceFramework, an open-source IOKit based USB device framework that provides support for USB devices on embedded and desktop platforms (iPhone OS and OS X). [Theos](http://github.com/DHowett/theos) support coming soon. ## Requirements * Xcode 4.x with Mac OS X 10.7 SDK or later * Xcode 4.x with iOS 5.1 SDK or later * USB ports * git ## How to use Simple. 
$ git clone --recursive git://github.com/winocm/USBDeviceFramework.git
## Licensing This software is licensed under the simplified BSD license.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
